title: The Big Chase (1954 Crime Drama) Directed by Arthur Hilton and Robert L. Lippert Jr.

sources.title: The Big Chase (1954 Crime Drama) Directed by Arthur Hilton and Robert L. Lippert Jr.
sources.description:
An LAPD rookie tangles with state prison paroled convicts who plan to rob an armored payroll truck in Los Angeles.

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/H73HiVcDzRs


Directors: Arthur Hilton, Robert L. Lippert Jr.
Writers: Fred Freiberger, Orville H. Hampton
Stars: Glenn Langan, Adele Jergens, Lon Chaney Jr.
Genre: Crime, Drama, Film Noir
Release Date: June 18, 1954 (USA)
